summary: This document is an email chain from July 2019 discussing the need for a contact at Deutsche Bank, possibly in relation to Jeffrey Epstein's financial matters, and mentions considering reaching out to Hoffenberg.

persons.name: Hoffenberg
persons.context: Mentioned as someone the email sender keeps meaning to ask about reaching out to, suggesting a potential connection to the matter at hand.

events.title: NYT Article on Epstein's Net Worth
events.description: A New York Times article is referenced in the email chain, discussing Jeffrey Epstein's net worth.

keyFacts: The email chain seeks a contact at Deutsche Bank or a law firm representing them, indicating potential financial or legal dealings related to the Epstein case.
The sender suggests reaching out to an individual named Hoffenberg, implying Hoffenberg may have relevant connections or information.
The correspondence references a contemporaneous New York Times article about Jeffrey Epstein's net worth, linking the discussion to public reporting on his finances.
The email is dated July 11, 2019, which is shortly before Epstein's arrest on July 6, 2019, suggesting ongoing financial or legal preparations or inquiries.
